com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.impl

Class SharedSecretAuthentication

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.impl.SharedSecretAuthentication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthenticationStrategy

    public class SharedSecretAuthentication
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthenticationStrategy

    Used for token-based/shared-secret authentication. A TokenGenerator can be supplied to this class in order to implement a token-generation policy.

    Version:
    1.0 03/21/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthenticationString

        public java.lang.String getAuthenticationString()
        Description copied from interface: AuthenticationStrategy
        Retrieves the authentication String for this AuthenticationStrategy. The authentication String is the value used to authenticate web service requests and is typically appended to the request URL or included as a header.
        Specified by:
        getAuthenticationString in interface AuthenticationStrategy
        Returns:
        authentication String

      • isHeader

        public boolean isHeader()
        Description copied from interface: AuthenticationStrategy
        Indicates if the authentication is included in the request headers.
        Specified by:
        isHeader in interface AuthenticationStrategy
        Returns:
        true if authentication is included as a header, false if not

      • setHeader

        public void setHeader(boolean isHeader)
        Description copied from interface: AuthenticationStrategy
        Sets the value indicating if authentication is included in the request headers.
        Specified by:
        setHeader in interface AuthenticationStrategy
        Parameters:
        isHeader - true if authentication is included as a header, false if not

      • setTokenName

        public void setTokenName(java.lang.String tokenName)
        Sets the token key name. The authentication String SharedSecretAuthentication generates, appears as tokenName=token, where tokenName is the token key name provided to this method and token is the shared secret.
        Parameters:
        tokenName - the token name to use for authentication

      • getTokenName

        public java.lang.String getTokenName()
        Returns the token key name.
        Returns:
        token name

      • setToken

        public void setToken(java.lang.String token)
        Sets the token value. The authentication String SharedSecretAuthentication generates, appears as tokenName=token, where tokenName is the token key name and token is the shared secret provided to this method.
        Parameters:
        token - the shared secret to use for authentication

      • getToken

        public java.lang.String getToken()
        Returns the token value. This is either the value provided to setToken(String) or the value generated from the TokenGenerator if one has been provided.
        Returns:
        shared secret

      • setTokenGenerator

        public void setTokenGenerator(TokenGenerator generator)
        Registers a TokenGenerator for this SharedSecretAuthentication strategy. The TokenGenerator is responsible for creating shared secrets.
        Parameters:
        generator - the TokenGenerator to register

      • clearTokenGenerator

        public void clearTokenGenerator()
        Removes any registered TokenGenerator from this SharedSecretAuthentication strategy.
